attributes.action: make all drugs legal in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we believe that all drugs should be made legal, the only problem they cause is police harassment about petty users. they cause no problems when taken in a club or social environment and should not be classed as illegal or immoral.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
